item.title: How I built my couch from scratch
item.description: My couch is one of my favorite projects. I built it almost completely from scratch. I’m not sure if that has ever been done before, but when I was researching during the design phase I couldn’t find much information about couch construction. If anyone else finds this, let it be known that there are a lot of things I would do differently in v2. see the end of this post for more on that
